alert.note: Alert for Bladen; Brunswick; Columbus; New Hanover; Pender (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 12 at 9:15AM EST until March 12 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern New Hanover County in southeastern North Carolina... Pender County in southeastern North Carolina... Southeastern Bladen County in southeastern North Carolina... Central Brunswick County in southeastern North Carolina... Eastern Columbus County in southeastern North Carolina... East central Horry County in northeastern South Carolina... * Until 1000 AM EST. * At 914 AM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Penderlea to near Longs, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Wilmington, Leland, Burgaw, Rowan, Lake Waccamaw, Northwest, Sandyfield, Penderlea, Makatoka, Point Caswell, Maple Hill, Hightsville, Long Creek, Cape Fear Community College North Campus, Exum, Longwood, Wilmington International Airport, Currie, Castle Hayne and Winnabow. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 PM EST for southeastern North Carolina...and northeastern South Carolina. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 PM EST for southeastern North Carolina...and northeastern South Carolina.

area.areaDesc: Bladen; Brunswick; Columbus; New Hanover; Pender
